title: Unveiling the Truth: The July Revolution 2025
description: A deep dive into the events of the July Revolution in Bangladesh—how people stood against oppression, fought for justice, and reshaped history.

title: Exposing the System: Breaking the Chains of Tyranny
description: An investigative analysis into the oppressive structures that led to the revolution and the fight for fundamental rights in Bangladesh.

title: Sorob’s Role in the Movement for Justice
description: How Sorob stood at the forefront of the revolution, advocating for human rights and exposing corruption during Bangladesh's historic uprising.

title: Fact Check: The Truth Behind the July 2025 Suppression
description: Separating propaganda from reality—uncovering the hidden truths about state oppression and the people's resistance in the fight for justice.
